service.name: S_01
service.description: Place cover: the cover (consumable) is placed on the base

service.name: S_02
service.description: Insert axis: insert the axis into the base

service.name: S_03
service.description: Insert and place: insert the axis and place the cover (consumables)

service.name: C_01
service.description: Assembly: the cover (raw material) is placed on the intermediate product
